properties.areaDesc: Whitfield, GA; Walker, GA; Floyd, GA; Murray, GA; Gordon, GA; Chattooga, GA; Bartow, GA; Catoosa, GA
properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 11 at 3:42PM EST until January 11 at 4:30PM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Catoosa County in northwestern Georgia...
Western Murray County in northwestern Georgia...
Floyd County in northwestern Georgia...
Whitfield County in northwestern Georgia...
Eastern Walker County in northwestern Georgia...
Western Gordon County in northwestern Georgia...
Central Chattooga County in northwestern Georgia...
Western Bartow County in northwestern Georgia...

* Until 430 PM EST.

* At 341 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line
extending from Fairview to near Tidings to near Forney, moving
northeast at 45 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees.

* Locations impacted include...
Rome, Dalton, Calhoun, Lafayette, Summerville, Chatsworth,
Ringgold, Fort Oglethorpe, Adairsville, Chickamauga, Trion,
Varnell, Cave Spring, Tunnel Hill, Cohutta, Kingston, Resaca,
Plainville, Taylorsville and Shannon.
properties.instruction:
A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for northwestern
Georgia.

For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.

This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms are producing widespread
wind damage across northwest Georgia. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a
sturdy structure and stay away from windows! If you see wind
damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and
then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4
4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
